SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BubbleFlow
BubbleFlow class, contains the GUI for the employee ordering interface
ButtonColumn
The ButtonColumn class provides a renderer and an editor that looks like a JButton.
DatabaseConnection
 
dbSetup
 
Drink
Drink class, holds all the information about a drink Primarily used by the DAOs to interface with the database and return data drink_id: Int unique identifier for the drink drink_name: String name of the drink drink_category_id: Int identifier for the category, corresponds to a DrinkCategory drink_price: Double price of the drink active_months: String months the drink is active
DrinkCategory
Drink Categories Class Holds information of drink category table entries from the database Used by DAOs to interface with the database and return data drink_category: Int unique identifier for the drink category drink_category_name: String name of the drink category
DrinkCategoryDAO
Data access object for the Drink Categories database table -Fetches drink categories from the database -Adds new drink categories -Updates existing drink categories -Deletes drink categories
DrinkDAO
Data Access object for the drinks database table -Displays drinks to the user Example usage: DrinkDAO drinkDAO = new DrinkDAO(); List drinks = drinkDAO.getAllDrinks();
DrinkRecipe
DrinkRecipe class, holds all the information about a drink recipe Primarily used by the DAOs to interface with the database and return data ingredient_id: Int unique identifier for the ingredient drink_id: Int unique identifier for the drink
DrinkRecipeDAO
Data Access object for the Drink_Recipe database table -Adds new drink recipes Table Drink_Recipe: Ingredient_ID INT NOT NULL Drink_ID INT NOT NULL
Employee
Employee class, holds all the information about an employee Primarily used by the DAOs to interface with the database and return data employee_id: Int unique identifier for the employee employee_name: String name of the employee employee_email: String email of the employee employee_phone: String phone number of the employee employee_position: String position of the employee
EmployeeDAO
Employee data acess object - used to make queries on employees table for manager functions - fetches list of employees - adds and removes employees - updates qualities of current employees
ExtraAndTopping
ExtraAndTopping class, holds all the information about an extra or topping Primarily used by the DAOs to interface with the database and return data extra_id: Int unique identifier for the extra or topping extra_name: String name of the extra or topping extra_category_id: Int identifier for the category, corresponds to an ExtraCategory extra_price: Double price of the extra or topping
ExtraAndToppingDAO
Extra and Topping data access object - used to display all toppings/extras Example usage: ExtraAndToppingDAO extraDAO = new ExtraAndToppingDAO(); ArrayList extrasAndToppings = extraDAO.getAllExtrasAndTopping();
ExtraCategory
ExtraCategory class, holds all the information about an extra category Primarily used by the DAOs to interface with the database and return data Extra_Category_ID: Int unique identifier for the extra category Extra_Category_NAME: String name of the extra category
ExtraCategoryDAO
Data access object for the Extra Categories database table -Gets all extra category objects from the database
GenerateID
Class used to generate fresh IDs for new objects - Employees, inventory, orders, drinks, drink categories, extra categories, and ingredients - Queries database to ensure no overlap in IDs Example usage: Use GenerateID.employee() to get the next employee ID
Ingredient
Ingredient class, holds all the information about an ingredient Primarily used by the DAOs to interface with the database and return data ingredient_id: Int unique identifier for the ingredient item_id: Int unique identifier for the item ingredient_category_id: Int unique identifier for the ingredient category ingredient_quantity: Int quantity of the ingredient ingredient_metric: String metric of the ingredient
IngredientCategory
Ingredient Categories Class Holds information of ingredient category table entries from the database Used by DAOs to interface with the database and return data ingredient_category_id: Int unique identifier for the ingredient category ingredient_category_name: String name of the ingredient category
IngredientCategoryDAO
 
IngredientDAO
 
IngredientTotal
IngredientTotal Class Holds information of ingredient total table entries from the database Used by DAOs to interface with the database and return data itemId: Int unique identifier for an item in the ingredients list itemName: String name of the item ingredientMetric: String metric of the ingredient totalIngredientUsed: Double total amount of the ingredient used
IngredientTotalDAO
Data access object for getting the total amount of ingredients used in a given time interval
Inventory
Inventory Class Holds information of inventory table entries from the database Used by DAOs to interface with the database and return data item_id: Int unique identifier for the item item_name: String name of the item item_metric: String metric of the item item_quantity: Double quantity of the item
InventoryDAO
Data access object for the Inventory database table - keeps track of current items in the store - retrieves data from the current inventory - allows for updates to current items as well as additions to the database
ManagerEmployees
ManagerEmployees class that displays the GUI for the employee management page Connects to the database to display current employees and allow functionality to add, update, and delete employees employeeDAO: EmployeeDAO object that connects to the database model: DefaultTableModel object that holds the data for the JTable
ManagerInventory
ManagerInventory class creates GUI for the inventory management page Communicates with database using DAOs to display DB info and update the DB from the page inventoryDAO: InventoryDAO object to communicate with the database model: DefaultTableModel object to handle GUI
ManagerMenu
ManagerMenu class creates the Menu Management GUI Allows the manager to view, add, modify, and delete drinks and drink categories Communicates with database to update and retrieve information drinkDAO: Data Access Object for Drink drinkCategoryDAO: Data Access Object for DrinkCategory drinksPanel: Panel to display drinks inventoryDAO: Data Access Object for Inventory drinkRecipeDAO: Data Access Object for DrinkRecipe mainPanel: Panel to display the main content categoriesPanel: Panel to display drink categories
ManagerReportProductUsage
ManagerReportProductUsage class displays the proudct usage report for the Reports page Displays the total amount of each ingredient used in the specified date range Extension of JPanel because MRPU itself is not a window
ManagerReports
ManagerReports class displays a window containing all the manager reports for the manager Has the X and Z reports, product usage reports, and the Sales History report in separate tabbed windows
ManagerReportSalesReport
ManagerReportSalesReport class displays the sales report for the Reports page Displays the total amount of each drink sold in the specified date range Extension of JPanel because MRSR itself is not a window
ManagerReportXReport
ManagerReportXReport class displays the X-report for the Reports page Displays the daily sales summary in either hourly sales or detailed format Extension of JPanel because MRXR itself is not a window
ManagerReportZReport
 
ManagerView
ManagerView class displays the manager view page Displays the buttons for the manager to navigate to different pages Extension of JFrame because ManagerView is a window
Order
Order class, holds all the information about an order Primarily used by the DAOs to interface with the database and return data order_id: Int unique identifier for the order customer: String name of the customer order_total_price: Double total price of the order order_date: Timestamp date of the order employee_id: Int unique identifier for the employee
OrderDAO
Data access object for Order - used to create orders - todo: update inventory table after adding order example usage on frontend, where extraId and drinkId are fetched from GUI interface: OrderDAO orderDAO = new OrderDAO(); int orderId = orderDAO.createOrder("Cam", 6.50, 1); orderDAO.addOrderItem(orderId, drinkId); orderDAO.addOrderExtra(orderId, extraId);
OrderExtra
OrderExtra Class Holds information of order_extra table entries from the database Used by DAOs to interface with the database and return data order_id: Int unique identifier for the order extras_id: Int unique identifier for the extra
OrderExtraDAO
 
OrderItem
OrderItem Class Holds information of order_item table entries from the database Used by DAOs to interface with the database and return data order_id: Int unique identifier for the order drink_id: Int unique identifier for the drink
OrderItemDAO
 
ReportDAO
 
SalesHistoryPopup
SalesHistoryPopup class displays the sales history popup DEPRACATED - Sales History has been moved to a tab on the ManagerReports page instead of a popup - Still funcitonal, but functionality has been moved to the ManagerReportsSalesHistory class
